original: @1b # // byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa /
analyzed: @1b # // byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa /
translated: Cultivating Bodhicitta

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the youthful Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´!

original: bdag mang gnyis nyid bde gshegs mi rtog ye shes chos dbyings sku brnyes pa //
analyzed: bdag mang gnyis nyid bde gshegs mi rtog ye shes chos dbyings sku brnyes pa //
translated: The Sugatas have attained the dharmadhƒÅtu kƒÅya, the nonconceptual wisdom of the two kinds of benefit,

original: kun gyi rang bzhin zhi ba 'di la gsal zhing bla med lam mchog ste //
analyzed: kun gyi rang bzhin zhi ba 'di la gsal zhing bla med lam mchog ste //
translated: The nature of all, peace, this is the clear and supreme path.

original: mi ldog sa la sogs te dbang bcu rgyal ba kun dang gcig brnyes pa //
analyzed: mi ldog sa la sogs te dbang bcu rgyal ba kun dang gcig brnyes pa //
translated: The ten powers, such as irreversibility, are attained by all the victors,

original: gnas gsum mnyam nyid de la mtshan med yid kyis rab tu dad pas mos //
analyzed: gnas gsum mnyam nyid de la mtshan med yid kyis rab tu dad pas mos //
translated: And in this, the equality of the three spheres, one should have faith with a mind free of characteristics.

original: ston pa 'jig rten sgron mar gyur pa kun gyis mtshungs par rab bsngags pa //
analyzed: ston pa 'jig rten sgron mar gyur pa kun gyis mtshungs par rab bsngags pa //
translated: All the teachers, the lamps of the world, have praised this equally,

original: chos la chos kyi snying por gyur pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu snying po nyid //
analyzed: chos la chos kyi snying por gyur pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu snying po nyid //
translated: The essence of the Dharma, the youthful Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, the essence itself.

original: bde gshegs ma lus yum du gyur pas rgyal ba kun gyi lam gcig go //
analyzed: bde gshegs ma lus yum du gyur pas rgyal ba kun gyi lam gcig go //
translated: The mother of all the Sugatas, it is the sole path of all the victors.

original: tshul khrims la sogs pha rol phyin lam spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa //
analyzed: tshul khrims la sogs pha rol phyin lam spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa //
translated: The basis of the ocean of conduct on the path of the perfections, such as discipline,

original: rnam dag byang chub sems kyi ngang tshul bsgoms dang yon tan khyad par ni //
analyzed: rnam dag byang chub sems kyi ngang tshul bsgoms dang yon tan khyad par ni //
translated: The special qualities of the one who cultivates the nature of pure bodhicitta

original: blo ldan nam zhig sems kyi dam pa de ni mngon du gyur pa na //
analyzed: blo ldan nam zhig sems kyi dam pa de ni mngon du gyur pa na //
translated: are that the wise one, at some point, will manifest that holy mind.

original: de la sku gsum mchog tu gyur par chos kyi sku zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
analyzed: de la sku gsum mchog tu gyur par chos kyi sku zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
translated: The Victorious One has said that the supreme of the three kƒÅyas is the dharmakƒÅya.

original: shes byed dam par gyur pa shes rab @2a * //
analyzed: shes byed dam par gyur pa shes rab @2a * //
translated: The supreme of the knowers is

original: spyan zhes kyang ni de la bya //
analyzed: spyan zhes kyang ni de la bya //
translated: called the ‚Äúeye of wisdom.‚Äù

original: rdo rje rtse mo mchog nyid mi rtog ye shes de yang de nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mo mchog nyid mi rtog ye shes de yang de nyid do //
translated: The supreme of the vajra tips is nonconceptual wisdom.

original: ji snyed 'phags pa'i rnam grol chos su bsnyad pa de dag thams cad kyang //
analyzed: ji snyed 'phags pa'i rnam grol chos su bsnyad pa de dag thams cad kyang //
translated: All the qualities of the noble ones‚Äô complete liberation

original: byang chub sems nyid rdzogs pas de yi yon tan de dag de las byung //
analyzed: byang chub sems nyid rdzogs pas de yi yon tan de dag de las byung //
translated: are the qualities of that, because the mind of enlightenment is perfected.

original: 'phags pa'i rigs chen 'chi med byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i rigs chen 'chi med byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang //
translated: All the noble ones, the immortal bodhisattvas,

original: de med mi 'byung de phyir de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam nyid do //
analyzed: de med mi 'byung de phyir de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam nyid do //
translated: do not arise without it. Therefore, it is the supreme path of liberation.

original: de nas kun du  rdo rje sems dpa' ci 'drar bsgom par bya bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de nas kun du  rdo rje sems dpa' ci 'drar bsgom par bya bar 'gyur //
translated: Then, how is one to meditate on Samantabhadra Vajrasattva?

original: pha zhing shes dka' drang srong chen po'i lam 'di mi rtog las 'das //
analyzed: pha zhing shes dka' drang srong chen po'i lam 'di mi rtog las 'das //
translated: This path of the great sages, difficult to understand, is nonconceptual and beyond thought.

original: brtag par dka' zhing ba stan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral //
analyzed: brtag par dka' zhing ba stan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral //
translated: It is difficult to examine and difficult to demonstrate, free from all conventions of expression.

original: tshig gis mi phebs gzhan dang byis pa kun gyi spyod yul ma yin yang //
analyzed: tshig gis mi phebs gzhan dang byis pa kun gyi spyod yul ma yin yang //
translated: Not accessible through words, it is not the domain of experience of others or the childish.

original: ston pa nges pa'i lung dang bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag de nyid don 'dir blta //
analyzed: ston pa nges pa'i lung dang bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag de nyid don 'dir blta //
translated: Yet, relying on the teachings of the Buddha and the instructions of sublime masters, one should look into the meaning of suchness.üîΩThose who analyze the tenets of established philosophical systems,

original: mngon sum la sogs rgyu yi dngos po 'jig cing grub pa'i mtha' dpyod pa //
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs rgyu yi dngos po 'jig cing grub pa'i mtha' dpyod pa //
translated: Destroying the evidence of direct perception and other means of valid cognition,

original: de nyid rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs dpyod yul tshad mar bzhag nas blo yis 'jig byed de //
analyzed: de nyid rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs dpyod yul tshad mar bzhag nas blo yis 'jig byed de //
translated: Destroy the objects of analysis that are followed by the stream of conceptual thought, and thus destroy the valid cognition that is the mind.

original: rtog mtha' med phyir dpyod mtha' med de snying po med na tshad mar gang //
analyzed: rtog mtha' med phyir dpyod mtha' med de snying po med na tshad mar gang //
translated: Since there is no end to conceptual thought, there is no end to analysis. If there is no essence, what is there to be validly cognized?

original: de phyir 'jig rten brtags pa'i tha snyad rnal 'byor lam 'dir mi dgos @2b so ;
analyzed: de phyir 'jig rten brtags pa'i tha snyad rnal 'byor lam 'dir mi dgos @2b so ;
translated: Therefore, the conventions of worldly analysis are not necessary on this path of yoga.

original: ; dngos po mtha' yi rgyu ni lo rgyus dag las lam 'dir brtag par bya //
analyzed: ; dngos po mtha' yi rgyu ni lo rgyus dag las lam 'dir brtag par bya //
translated: The ultimate cause of things should be analyzed on this path through the stories of the past.

original: skye bo kun gyi sems la mngon snang phyi nang grags pa'i chos 'di ni //
analyzed: skye bo kun gyi sems la mngon snang phyi nang grags pa'i chos 'di ni //
translated: The phenomena of outer and inner that appear to the minds of all beings

original: 'dzin pa drug gi ji ltar mthong zhing brtags pa de ltar ma yin 'khrul //
analyzed: 'dzin pa drug gi ji ltar mthong zhing brtags pa de ltar ma yin 'khrul //
translated: Are not as they are seen and imagined by the six kinds of reificationists.

original: rang gi rtog pas myos shing gzung ba de bzhin bden gyur na //
analyzed: rang gi rtog pas myos shing gzung ba de bzhin bden gyur na //
translated: If what is deluded by one‚Äôs own thoughts and grasped at were true,

original: de dag dngos po med rtogs dgra bcom 'dra bar grol 'gyur pa yi rigs //
analyzed: de dag dngos po med rtogs dgra bcom 'dra bar grol 'gyur pa yi rigs //
translated: It would be reasonable that one would be liberated like an arhat who realizes things to be nonexistent.

original: de dag dus dgras 'joms dang sdug bsngal nyen las des 'khrul mngon par 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag dus dgras 'joms dang sdug bsngal nyen las des 'khrul mngon par 'gyur //
translated: But they are deluded by the enemy of time and are harmed by the danger of suffering.

original: gzhan du skye mched sgo nas rig pa de dag tshad mar gyur na ni //
analyzed: gzhan du skye mched sgo nas rig pa de dag tshad mar gyur na ni //
translated: If, on the other hand, those who know through the sense doors were valid,

original: de nyid tshad mar gyur pas 'phags pa'i lam de su la dgos mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid tshad mar gyur pas 'phags pa'i lam de su la dgos mi 'gyur //
translated: Then, since they would be valid, the path of the noble ones would be unnecessary.

original: lam de rnam grol lam du ba stan cing dbang po'i shes pas mi thar te //
analyzed: lam de rnam grol lam du ba stan cing dbang po'i shes pas mi thar te //
translated: That path is taught to be the path of liberation, but it is not liberated by the consciousnesses of the sense faculties.

original: sdug bsngal 'ga' yang mi 'jil rnam rig shes te nyon mongs 'byung ba'i gnas //
analyzed: sdug bsngal 'ga' yang mi 'jil rnam rig shes te nyon mongs 'byung ba'i gnas //
translated: It does not eliminate any suffering at all, but it is the basis for the arising of afflictions.

original: de phyir skye bos mthong ba de dag 'khrul par mngon zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
analyzed: de phyir skye bos mthong ba de dag 'khrul par mngon zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
translated: Therefore, the Victorious One has said, ‚ÄúWhat people see is clearly deluded.‚ÄùüîΩHow is it that these appearances occur due to delusion?üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.

original: de na de las 'di dag 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ji ltar snang bar 'gyur zhe na ;üîΩ/ kun du  rtog can yan lag ma yin kun du  rtog pas rtsol med nyams //
analyzed: de na de las 'di dag 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ji ltar snang bar 'gyur zhe na ; / kun du  rtog can yan lag ma yin kun du  rtog pas rtsol med nyams //
translated: The mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.

original: blo gros phyin ci log tu gyur cing ma rig rkyen gyi dbang song bas //üîΩsems dang sems las byung ba de nyid lus gsum don du snang ba yin //
analyzed: blo gros phyin ci log tu gyur cing ma rig rkyen gyi dbang song bas // sems dang sems las byung ba de nyid lus gsum don du snang ba yin //
translated: The mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.

original: 'du byed sna tshogs dag gis bag chags bsags las gang goms mthu brtas tshe //üîΩsems nyid yul dang lus 'drar snang ba rus bas gang ba bzhin du snang //üîΩbag chags bsags pa'i rgyun la dmigs skyes yid la brtags pa'i bdag med pa //
analyzed: 'du byed sna tshogs dag gis bag chags bsags las gang goms mthu brtas tshe // sems nyid yul dang lus 'drar snang ba rus bas gang ba bzhin du snang // bag chags bsags pa'i rgyun la dmigs skyes yid la brtags pa'i bdag med pa //
translated: The mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.

original: 'du byed mthu yis bsgribs shing phra ba ma mthong de las rnam rig skye //
analyzed: 'du byed mthu yis bsgribs shing phra ba ma mthong de las rnam rig skye //
translated: The mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.üîΩThe mind and mental factors, which are conceptual, are effortlessly experienced through non-analytical conceptualization.

original: rgyun dang bcas pa'i sems kyi mthu ni ma rtogs rtog pa'i rjes 'brangs nas //
analyzed: rgyun dang bcas pa'i sems kyi mthu ni ma rtogs rtog pa'i rjes 'brangs nas //
translated: The power of the mind with its continuity is not understood by those who follow conceptual thoughts.

original: de las zag bcas rang bzhin rtog pas bdag dang chos rnams rgyas par byed //
analyzed: de las zag bcas rang bzhin rtog pas bdag dang chos rnams rgyas par byed //
translated: From that, the nature of the contaminated is expanded by concepts into self and phenomena.

original: ldan par 'byung ba shin tu phra bar rgyu ba de ni ma mthong las //
analyzed: ldan par 'byung ba shin tu phra bar rgyu ba de ni ma mthong las //
translated: That subtle movement of the arising of possession is not seen.

original: bdag tu lta la sogs pa mu stegs lta ba sna tshogs skye zhing thar pa rtog / sems 'di las rnams mtha' yas gnas gyur bag chags mtha' med nges pa med //
analyzed: bdag tu lta la sogs pa mu stegs lta ba sna tshogs skye zhing thar pa rtog / sems 'di las rnams mtha' yas gnas gyur bag chags mtha' med nges pa med //
translated: From this mind, the limitless actions transform, and the limitless traces are indefinite.

original: bag chags brtas shing sad par byed pa'i rkyen yang rnam pa sna tshogs te //
analyzed: bag chags brtas shing sad par byed pa'i rkyen yang rnam pa sna tshogs te //
translated: The conditions that increase and awaken the traces are also various.

original: rkyen 'gas bag chags 'ga' zhig smin nas mi yi rgyud kyi lus snang ba //
analyzed: rkyen 'gas bag chags 'ga' zhig smin nas mi yi rgyud kyi lus snang ba //
translated: Some traces ripen by some conditions, appearing in the body of a human continuum.

original: rkyen gzhan dag gis bag chags gzhan sad byas tshe 'gyur ba'i mthu mthong nas //üîΩdbang phyug la @3a * //
analyzed: rkyen gzhan dag gis bag chags gzhan sad byas tshe 'gyur ba'i mthu mthong nas // dbang phyug la @3a * //
translated: When other conditions awaken other traces, the power of transformation is seen.

original: sogs byed par 'dod de nyes pa lam de mi zhi grol mi 'gyur //
analyzed: sogs byed par 'dod de nyes pa lam de mi zhi grol mi 'gyur //
translated: Desiring that ƒ™≈õvara and so on are the agents, the faults are not pacified, and liberation is not attained.

original: rnal 'byor lam slad the tshom rgyun 'di phra ba ma rtogs skyes //
analyzed: rnal 'byor lam slad the tshom rgyun 'di phra ba ma rtogs skyes //
translated: This stream of doubt is born from not understanding the subtle path of yoga.

original: bdag tu brtags bas bsgribs te 'phags pa'i rigs dang rnam par bral //
analyzed: bdag tu brtags bas bsgribs te 'phags pa'i rigs dang rnam par bral //
translated: Obscured by the imputation of self, it is far from the family of the noble ones.

original: chos su btags pas sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'byung zhing ngan song srid par 'gyur //
analyzed: chos su btags pas sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'byung zhing ngan song srid par 'gyur //
translated: Imputed as phenomena, it gives rise to various sufferings and leads to the lower realms.

original: rnam shes de yang 'du byed rgyun la mtshan ma tha dad 'dzin pas na //
analyzed: rnam shes de yang 'du byed rgyun la mtshan ma tha dad 'dzin pas na //
translated: That consciousness also apprehends different characteristics in the stream of formations,

original: las kyi khyad par dag gis brgyang du snang gi rigs la tha dad med //
analyzed: las kyi khyad par dag gis brgyang du snang gi rigs la tha dad med //
translated: so it appears as various due to the differences in karma, but there is no difference in the family.

original: de phyir sems kyi skad cig dang po de la lus dang chos kun gnas //
analyzed: de phyir sems kyi skad cig dang po de la lus dang chos kun gnas //
translated: Therefore, in the first moment of mind, the body and all phenomena are present.

original: de la bsam pa zhen pa'i phyir na phyi ma phyi ma de la snang //
analyzed: de la bsam pa zhen pa'i phyir na phyi ma phyi ma de la snang //
translated: Since it is attached to that, it appears in the subsequent moments.

original: rang sems rgyun las 'phags pa skye bo chos ni gzhan na yod ma yin //
analyzed: rang sems rgyun las 'phags pa skye bo chos ni gzhan na yod ma yin //
translated: The noble ones are born from the stream of one's own mind; phenomena do not exist elsewhere.

original: rgyud drug rigs las de yang sna tshogs de dang rang gi ting 'dzin no //
analyzed: rgyud drug rigs las de yang sna tshogs de dang rang gi ting 'dzin no //
translated: That also has various [forms] from the six families and one's own concentration.

original: sems rgyun de las phyogs kyang cung zad med pas gcig la brten med de //
analyzed: sems rgyun de las phyogs kyang cung zad med pas gcig la brten med de //
translated: Since there is not even the slightest direction apart from that stream of mind, it does not depend on one [thing].

original: de la phyogs med phyir na mtha' yas zhing rnams bdag gi lus //
analyzed: de la phyogs med phyir na mtha' yas zhing rnams bdag gi lus //
translated: Since it is impartial, the infinite realms appear as my body.

original: bdag gi lus ni mtha' yas zhing dang skye bo'i lus su rab snang yang //
analyzed: bdag gi lus ni mtha' yas zhing dang skye bo'i lus su rab snang yang //
translated: My body appears as the bodies of infinite realms and beings,

original: sems dang bag chags gcig min tha dad ma yin brtag par rab tu dka' //
analyzed: sems dang bag chags gcig min tha dad ma yin brtag par rab tu dka' //
translated: But mind and habitual patterns are neither one nor different, and are difficult to examine.

original: 'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung tshul te skye dang 'gag par 'gyur zhes pa //
analyzed: 'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung tshul te skye dang 'gag par 'gyur zhes pa //
translated: All of this is the way of dependent origination, arising and ceasing.

original: tshig pa'i sa bon bzhin du med las med pa mi 'byung rgyu 'bras med //
analyzed: tshig pa'i sa bon bzhin du med las med pa mi 'byung rgyu 'bras med //
translated: Like a burnt seed, nothing arises from nothing; there is no cause and effect.

original: dngos por zhen cing rgyu dang 'bras bur rtog pa'i sems nyid ni //
analyzed: dngos por zhen cing rgyu dang 'bras bur rtog pa'i sems nyid ni //
translated: The mind itself, which clings to things and conceives of cause and effect,

original: rgyu dang rkyen du snang ste de gnyis med phyir skye dang 'jig pa med //
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen du snang ste de gnyis med phyir skye dang 'jig pa med //
translated: Appears as causes and conditions, but since those two do not exist, there is no arising or perishing.

original: skye 'jig med phyir bdag gzhan med de 'chi 'pho med phyir rtag chad med //
analyzed: skye 'jig med phyir bdag gzhan med de 'chi 'pho med phyir rtag chad med //
translated: Since there is no arising or perishing, there is no self or other; since there is no death and transition, there is no permanence or annihilation.

original: des na 'khrul 'khor med cing mya ngan 'das pa med pa nyid du mngon //
analyzed: des na 'khrul 'khor med cing mya ngan 'das pa med pa nyid du mngon //
translated: Therefore, there is no samsara and no nirvana.

original: gnas kyi skad cig nam yang mi 'bras de tshe mnyam 'gyur de med med //
analyzed: gnas kyi skad cig nam yang mi 'bras de tshe mnyam 'gyur de med med //
translated: The moment of abiding is never interrupted; at that time, there is equality, and nonexistence is not nonexistent.

original: yang dag ma yin rtog pas bskyed phyir bag chags yod pa ma yin dang // spyod yul med phyir kun gzhi med cing rnam rig de yang med pa bzhin //
analyzed: yang dag ma yin rtog pas bskyed phyir bag chags yod pa ma yin dang // spyod yul med phyir kun gzhi med cing rnam rig de yang med pa bzhin //
translated: Because it is produced by false imagination, there are no habitual tendencies; because there is no object, there is no all-base, and there is no consciousness either.

original: phyogs rnams med cing dmigs dang gnas med rnam par rig pa ji ltar skye //
analyzed: phyogs rnams med cing dmigs dang gnas med rnam par rig pa ji ltar skye //
translated: How can there be consciousness without directions, objects, and a location?

original: de phyir sems 'di yod med mtha' las 'das shing gcig dang du mar bral //
analyzed: de phyir sems 'di yod med mtha' las 'das shing gcig dang du mar bral //
translated: Therefore, this mind is beyond the extremes of existence and nonexistence and is free from being one or many.

original: bde gshegs byang chub med phyir de yi rdzu 'phrul sgyu 'dra 'khrul la snang //
analyzed: bde gshegs byang chub med phyir de yi rdzu 'phrul sgyu 'dra 'khrul la snang //
translated: Because there is no enlightenment of the sugatas, their miracles appear as illusions to the confused.

original: de bzhin dag pa'i ye shes de dag shin tu dge ba'i rgyun nyid dang // chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni de dag dmigs shing skye bar brtags pa yang //
analyzed: de bzhin dag pa'i ye shes de dag shin tu dge ba'i rgyun nyid dang // chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni de dag dmigs shing skye bar brtags pa yang //
translated: In the same way, those pure wisdoms are indeed a continuum of virtue, and they are imputed to arise and be observed in the dharmadhatu.

original: rdo rje'i gnas med phyir na @3b mnyam gnas rang bzhin 'drar 'gyur dang // chos dbyings rdo rje rtse mo de dag phyogs nyid med pas skad cig min //
analyzed: rdo rje'i gnas med phyir na @3b mnyam gnas rang bzhin 'drar 'gyur dang // chos dbyings rdo rje rtse mo de dag phyogs nyid med pas skad cig min //
translated: Because there is no vajra point, they become the same nature, and because those vajra points of the dharmadhatu have no direction, they are not momentary.

original: dag pa'i dge rtsa gzugs brnyan med pas 'jig rten ye shes yod mi 'gyur //
analyzed: dag pa'i dge rtsa gzugs brnyan med pas 'jig rten ye shes yod mi 'gyur //
translated: there is no mundane pristine awareness.

original: de phyir byang chub ma chub mtshan nyid med par gcig pas blang dor med //
analyzed: de phyir byang chub ma chub mtshan nyid med par gcig pas blang dor med //
translated: Therefore, since enlightenment and nonenlightenment are the same in being essentially ineffable, there is nothing to accept or reject.üîΩIn this way, all the teachings on the ultimate, such as the absence of origination and cessation, equality,

original: don de'i tshul gyis don dam rnam grangs skye 'gag med dang mnyam nyid dang // gnyis med bsam 'das chos dbyings brjod dang tha snyad bral la sogs //
analyzed: don de'i tshul gyis don dam rnam grangs skye 'gag med dang mnyam nyid dang // gnyis med bsam 'das chos dbyings brjod dang tha snyad bral la sogs //
translated: nonduality, transcendence of thought, the basic space of phenomena free of labels and expressions,

original: ba stan pa de kun tha snyad yin te don dam med cing kun sgrib med //
analyzed: ba stan pa de kun tha snyad yin te don dam med cing kun sgrib med //
translated: are conventional expressions, not the ultimate, and do not obscure the ultimate.

original: don dam tshul gyi lam 'dra zhes pa de nyid kun sgrib yin //
analyzed: don dam tshul gyi lam 'dra zhes pa de nyid kun sgrib yin //
translated: The so-called ‚Äúpath of the way of abiding in the ultimate‚Äù is itself an obscuration.

original: the tshom yod med chos ni gang la 'ang spong zhing gnas par mi byed do //
analyzed: the tshom yod med chos ni gang la 'ang spong zhing gnas par mi byed do //
translated: Do not reject or dwell on any phenomena, whether they are thought to exist or not.

original: sgom pa dang ni chos dbyings med phyir som nyi med la dam par blta ba la yang med //
analyzed: sgom pa dang ni chos dbyings med phyir som nyi med la dam par blta ba la yang med //
translated: Since there is no meditation and no basic space of phenomena, there is no doubt, and there is no view to be cultivated.

original: de ltar dngos po mtha' rnams rtag dang rang bzhin sgyu ma 'ang med gyur phyir //
analyzed: de ltar dngos po mtha' rnams rtag dang rang bzhin sgyu ma 'ang med gyur phyir //
translated: Since all things are essentially ineffable, they are neither permanent nor inherently illusory.

original: yod la ltos pa'i med pa 'ang med de med pa'ang med //
analyzed: yod la ltos pa'i med pa 'ang med de med pa'ang med //
translated: Nonexistence in dependence on existence does not exist, and nonexistence does not exist.

original: mtha' rnams med phyir dbus med dbus la 'ang gnas par mi byed la //
analyzed: mtha' rnams med phyir dbus med dbus la 'ang gnas par mi byed la //
translated: Since there are no extremes, there is no middle. Do not abide even in the middle.

original: gang la 'jig rten dbang phyug padma kun kyang mi spong 'drar mnyam gnas //
analyzed: gang la 'jig rten dbang phyug padma kun kyang mi spong 'drar mnyam gnas //
translated: The Lord of the World abides equally, without rejecting any lotus.

original: chos la 'khrul par mthong ba de nyid 'khrul pa yin par rab rtogs te //
analyzed: chos la 'khrul par mthong ba de nyid 'khrul pa yin par rab rtogs te //
translated: That which is seen as a mistake in phenomena is well realized to be a mistake.

original: drug gis ba stan pa bdud kyi las kyang mi 'dor ngan du mi rtog go //
analyzed: drug gis ba stan pa bdud kyi las kyang mi 'dor ngan du mi rtog go //
translated: Do not reject the deeds of MƒÅra, and do not think badly of them.

original: shes rab thabs kyi spyod la mi gnas phyir na bdud kyi 'dra par spyod //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi spyod la mi gnas phyir na bdud kyi 'dra par spyod //
translated: Since one does not abide in the conduct of wisdom and method, one engages in the deeds of MƒÅra.

original: rang gi shes pa dam par byas pa kun las rgyal te de bsnyems nas //
analyzed: rang gi shes pa dam par byas pa kun las rgyal te de bsnyems nas //
translated: Having conquered all through one‚Äôs own sacred wisdom, one becomes conceited.

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang skyes nas rtsod 'byung gti mug yin te don mi mthong //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang skyes nas rtsod 'byung gti mug yin te don mi mthong //
translated: Desire and anger arise, and then disputes arise. One is ignorant and does not see the meaning.

original: ji srid yid kyi g-yo ba de srid bdud kyi yul te phra ba'i lam //
analyzed: ji srid yid kyi g-yo ba de srid bdud kyi yul te phra ba'i lam //
translated: As long as there is movement of the mind, that is the domain of MƒÅra, the subtle path.

original: g-yo dang mi g-yo tha snyad mi gnas gnas pa la yang gnas par mi byed do //
analyzed: g-yo dang mi g-yo tha snyad mi gnas gnas pa la yang gnas par mi byed do //
translated: Do not abide in the conventions of movement and nonmovement. Do not abide even in abiding.

original: snang med dbu ma'i lam de byang chub sems zhes bde gshegs gsungs //
analyzed: snang med dbu ma'i lam de byang chub sems zhes bde gshegs gsungs //
translated: The Sugata has taught that the middle way, free from appearances, is bodhichitta.

original: gzugs dang mtshan ma smon par 'dzin pa rab tu spangs nas ni //
analyzed: gzugs dang mtshan ma smon par 'dzin pa rab tu spangs nas ni //
translated: Abandoning the grasping at form, signs, and wishes,

original: rnam thar gsum po bsgom pa'ang bdud kyi las te gzugs nying stong pa'o //
analyzed: rnam thar gsum po bsgom pa'ang bdud kyi las te gzugs nying stong pa'o //
translated: The meditation on the three doors of liberation is the work of Mara, for form itself is empty.

original: 'khor ba'i lam gsum spong zhing mya ngan 'das lam bsgom pa'ang bdud nyid de //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i lam gsum spong zhing mya ngan 'das lam bsgom pa'ang bdud nyid de //
translated: Abandoning the three paths of samsara and meditating on the path of nirvana is also Mara.

original: de nyid rang bzhin ma zhi rang bzhin brtsal spangs gar mi gnas //
analyzed: de nyid rang bzhin ma zhi rang bzhin brtsal spangs gar mi gnas //
translated: It is not peaceful by nature, and it is not to be sought or abandoned. It does not abide anywhere.

original: 'phags pa kun gyi yul dang gnas kyang 'das sogs lam nyid gzhan na med //
analyzed: 'phags pa kun gyi yul dang gnas kyang 'das sogs lam nyid gzhan na med //
translated: The domain and abode of all the noble ones is beyond samsara and nirvana. There is no other path.

original: ldang dang mi ldang ched du mi spong sems rten mi 'cha' mngon du min //
analyzed: ldang dang mi ldang ched du mi spong sems rten mi 'cha' mngon du min //
translated: Do not deliberately reject what is to be abandoned or what is not to be abandoned. Do not form mental constructs. Do not be obvious.

original: 'jam dpal @4a * //
analyzed: 'jam dpal @4a * //
translated: Manjushri,

original: ma yin rdul tsam g-yo ba de yin der mi gnas //
analyzed: ma yin rdul tsam g-yo ba de yin der mi gnas //
translated: Do not move even an atom. Do not abide there.

original: bsgom pa'i sa mi rnyed phyir bsgoms pas rnyed phrad mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i sa mi rnyed phyir bsgoms pas rnyed phrad mi 'gyur te //
translated: Since the stage of meditation is not to be found, it will not be found through meditation.

original: sems kyi spyod yul shes pa de dag chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid yin //
analyzed: sems kyi spyod yul shes pa de dag chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid yin //
translated: The knowledge of the domain of mind is the dharmata of phenomena.

original: rnam bral gang la mchog dang tha ma med par lam mchog 'di bsgom mo //
analyzed: rnam bral gang la mchog dang tha ma med par lam mchog 'di bsgom mo //
translated: ‚ÄúThose who are free of conceptualization cultivate this supreme path, without any sense of high or low.

original: 'du byed ma skyes chos kun 'byung med bzhin du chos rnams mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: 'du byed ma skyes chos kun 'byung med bzhin du chos rnams mya ngan 'das //
translated: ‚ÄúAll phenomena are unborn, and yet they are also not without origination. All phenomena are nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: dngos med de tshe kun kyang chos kyi dbyings zhes dgra bcom rab 'byor yin //
analyzed: dngos med de tshe kun kyang chos kyi dbyings zhes dgra bcom rab 'byor yin //
translated: At that time, all things are indeed the dharmadhƒÅtu, and so one is a worthy one, Subh≈´ti.

original: nam mkha' mi dmigs ming tsam dge dang mi dger 'byed med skye ba 'ang med //
analyzed: nam mkha' mi dmigs ming tsam dge dang mi dger 'byed med skye ba 'ang med //
translated: ‚ÄúSpace is nonapprehending and merely nominal. It is neither virtuous nor nonvirtuous, and it is unborn.

original: rtsol ba yid la mi byed gang la 'ang sems med shes dang mi shes bral //
analyzed: rtsol ba yid la mi byed gang la 'ang sems med shes dang mi shes bral //
translated: It is not something to be mentally engaged in with effort, and it is neither consciousness nor unconsciousness.

original: dran dang 'byed med gang la 'ang 'ga' dang mtshungs med mi gnas mi dmigs shing //
analyzed: dran dang 'byed med gang la 'ang 'ga' dang mtshungs med mi gnas mi dmigs shing //
translated: It is neither mindfulness nor conceptualization. It is neither anything nor nothing. It is neither abiding nor nonabiding. It is neither apprehending nor nonapprehending.

original: mnyam nas gnyis su brtag med brjod bral bya dang mi bya med de stsogs bri med //
analyzed: mnyam nas gnyis su brtag med brjod bral bya dang mi bya med de stsogs bri med //
translated: It is neither the same nor different. It is inexpressible. It is neither something to be done nor not to be done. It is free from all such things.

original: ched du rtsol bar yid la mi byed cis kyang mi 'khrugs mnyam shes dang // gang la 'ang chags dang yul gyis myos skrag med de mi 'bral mi gnas shing //
analyzed: ched du rtsol bar yid la mi byed cis kyang mi 'khrugs mnyam shes dang // gang la 'ang chags dang yul gyis myos skrag med de mi 'bral mi gnas shing //
translated: ‚ÄúOne does not mentally engage in deliberate effort. One is undisturbed by anything. One is aware of the sameness of everything. One is neither attached to anything nor intoxicated by objects. One is neither separate from anything nor abiding in anything.

original: mi 'phrogs mnyam shes bzhi po phyogs dang pha rol phyin rnams der shes te //
analyzed: mi 'phrogs mnyam shes bzhi po phyogs dang pha rol phyin rnams der shes te //
translated: The four kinds of knowledge that cannot be taken away, the four kinds of thorough knowledge, and the transcendent perfections are to be understood as being included in these.

original: sems kyi dbyings su goms pas lam 'di gzhan du bsgoms pas 'od gsal mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems kyi dbyings su goms pas lam 'di gzhan du bsgoms pas 'od gsal mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since one is familiar with the expanse of the mind, the clear light will not change, even if one meditates on other paths.

original: brda can yang dag len pa 'ang byang chub chen po yin zhes ston pas rab gsungs phyir ;
analyzed: brda can yang dag len pa 'ang byang chub chen po yin zhes ston pas rab gsungs phyir ;
translated: The one who takes up the true seal is also a great bodhisattva, as the teacher has clearly taught.

original: / de la 'di ni byang chub sems nyid bskyed cing bsgom pa'i gnas yin te //
analyzed: / de la 'di ni byang chub sems nyid bskyed cing bsgom pa'i gnas yin te //
translated: This is the place where the mind of awakening is generated and meditated upon.

original: ting 'dzin gsum po ba stan par byas nas rtags kyi phyag rgya gsum bcings nas //
analyzed: ting 'dzin gsum po ba stan par byas nas rtags kyi phyag rgya gsum bcings nas //
translated: Having been taught the three meditative absorptions, one binds the three symbolic seals.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya chen por sems nyid skyed de snying po brjod cing bsgom pa'i gnas //
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya chen por sems nyid skyed de snying po brjod cing bsgom pa'i gnas //
translated: The mind itself is generated in the great seal of reality, and one recites the essence mantra and meditates.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms pas lam kun ma nor bsgoms pa yin //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms pas lam kun ma nor bsgoms pa yin //
translated: By meditating on Vajrasattva, all the paths are meditated upon without error.

original: kun du  bzang po'i spyod pas ma zin dge ba'i chos ni gang yang rung //
analyzed: kun du  bzang po'i spyod pas ma zin dge ba'i chos ni gang yang rung //
translated: Any virtuous quality that is not embraced by the conduct of Samantabhadra

original: kun du  bzang po'i spyod pa'ang bdud kyi las te zad cing mthar thug 'gyur //
analyzed: kun du  bzang po'i spyod pa'ang bdud kyi las te zad cing mthar thug 'gyur //
translated: is the activity of Mara and will come to an end and be exhausted.

original: de dang ldan pa'i las ni bdud kyi las kyang byang chub spyod par gsungs //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i las ni bdud kyi las kyang byang chub spyod par gsungs //
translated: And the Buddha has said that the deeds of Mara are also the practice of enlightenment.

original: don 'dir mos pa de yang byang chub chen po yin zhes rgyal bas rab tu bsngags //
analyzed: don 'dir mos pa de yang byang chub chen po yin zhes rgyal bas rab tu bsngags //
translated: The Buddha has also praised the aspiration to this meaning as being the great enlightenment.

original: gnas 'dir bskyed pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po bla mar bcas pa yis //
analyzed: gnas 'dir bskyed pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po bla mar bcas pa yis //
translated: The Buddha has said that merely by generating it in this place, the three worlds with their gods

original: mchod nas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis gnon zhes sangs rgyas gsungs //
analyzed: mchod nas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis gnon zhes sangs rgyas gsungs //
translated: will make offerings and the disciples will overcome the hordes of Mara.

original: thabs chen byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i spyod pa 'di nyid @4b do ;
analyzed: thabs chen byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i spyod pa 'di nyid @4b do ;
translated: This very secret conduct of the bodhisattva of great means

original: /'di med rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad theg pa gsum ston mi srid do //
analyzed: /'di med rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad theg pa gsum ston mi srid do //
translated: is impossible without it, and the Victor Vairocana does not teach the three vehicles.

original: skad cig tsam du dang pa'i shugs bskyed de yang myur du 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur //
analyzed: skad cig tsam du dang pa'i shugs bskyed de yang myur du 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur //
translated: Even the momentary generation of the power of faith will quickly make one a youthful Manjushri.

original: dkyil 'khor gsang bar zhugs shing theg chen dam tshig mchog kyang gsungs pa yin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gsang bar zhugs shing theg chen dam tshig mchog kyang gsungs pa yin //
translated: One will enter the secret mandala and be taught the supreme commitment of the Great Vehicle.

original: tshul khrims sdom pa kun kyang srungs shing spyin gnas dam par rab tu bsngags //
analyzed: tshul khrims sdom pa kun kyang srungs shing spyin gnas dam par rab tu bsngags //
translated: One will also keep all the vows of ethical discipline and be praised as the supreme recipient of offerings.

original: de phyir byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de la gzugs yod na //
analyzed: de phyir byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de la gzugs yod na //
translated: Therefore, if the merit of the thought of awakening had a form,

original: nam mkha' bar snang de yang snod du chugs zhes rgyal bas mtshungs par gsungs //
analyzed: nam mkha' bar snang de yang snod du chugs zhes rgyal bas mtshungs par gsungs //
translated: the Victorious One said that the space of the sky would not contain it.

original: skye bo skye ba sna tshogs dag las skyes shing skye 'gyur skye ba'i rgyun gyi dbang song ba //
analyzed: skye bo skye ba sna tshogs dag las skyes shing skye 'gyur skye ba'i rgyun gyi dbang song ba //
translated: Beings are born from various beings and will be born, under the power of the stream of birth.

original: rtog mtha' mi shes rtog pas bslus shing rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs 'khrul pa'i rtog las phyir ldog med gyur pa //
analyzed: rtog mtha' mi shes rtog pas bslus shing rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs 'khrul pa'i rtog las phyir ldog med gyur pa //
translated: They do not know the end of conceptualization, are deceived by conceptualization, and follow the stream of conceptualization, unable to turn back from the activity of mistaken conceptualization.

original: sgyu ma'i sgyu shes dag cing sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bar sgyu mas rmongs pa'i sgyu ma rnams //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i sgyu shes dag cing sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bar sgyu mas rmongs pa'i sgyu ma rnams //
translated: Those who know the illusion of illusion, who are pure, and who are like an illusory elephant, are confused by illusion.

original: rmi lam gyis bslad bzhin du rmi lam bden pa nyams shing rmi lam dbang du song ba'i rmi lam ba //
analyzed: rmi lam gyis bslad bzhin du rmi lam bden pa nyams shing rmi lam dbang du song ba'i rmi lam ba //
translated: Like one who is confused by a dream, the truth of a dream is lost, and one is under the power of a dream.

original: lam 'di spong zhing mtha' dang lam gzhan lam du bltas nas ma nor lam zhes ston pa de //
analyzed: lam 'di spong zhing mtha' dang lam gzhan lam du bltas nas ma nor lam zhes ston pa de //
translated: Those who abandon this path and look to other paths and extremes as the path, teaching them to be the unmistaken path,

original: de dag rdo la gser bzhin thugs rjer rung zhing thugs rje'i thugs rjes kye ma 'bros pa yin //
analyzed: de dag rdo la gser bzhin thugs rjer rung zhing thugs rje'i thugs rjes kye ma 'bros pa yin //
translated: They are suitable as compassion, like gold in a stone, and by the compassion of compassion, alas, they flee.

original: shin tu ma sbyangs dus kyis mnar ba'i skye bo lnga brgya tha ma la //
analyzed: shin tu ma sbyangs dus kyis mnar ba'i skye bo lnga brgya tha ma la //
translated: In the final five hundred years, when people are oppressed by the degeneration of time and are not well refined,

original: gsung rab dri med rtogs dka' dag la sgra bzhin spyod dang tshul bzhin min //
analyzed: gsung rab dri med rtogs dka' dag la sgra bzhin spyod dang tshul bzhin min //
translated: They engage literally and incorrectly in the stainless scriptures, which are difficult to understand,

original: rang gi blo gros stobs bzhin 'jug pa la sogs lta ba sna tshogs dag / mi shes chu bos g-yengs shing gsung gi nyid gu bdud rtsi rnal 'byor bral //
analyzed: rang gi blo gros stobs bzhin 'jug pa la sogs lta ba sna tshogs dag / mi shes chu bos g-yengs shing gsung gi nyid gu bdud rtsi rnal 'byor bral //
translated: And various views arise due to the power of their own intellect, and so on. Carried away by the river of ignorance, they are separated from the nectar of the speech.

original: de phyir rgyal bas gsungs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba 'di //
analyzed: de phyir rgyal bas gsungs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba 'di //
translated: Therefore, this secret of the mind taught by the Victorious Ones,

original: kun du  rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs kyi spyod yul thun mong ma yin yang //
analyzed: kun du  rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs kyi spyod yul thun mong ma yin yang //
translated: Although it is not the common sphere of experience of the minds of all the Victorious Ones,

original: goms pa'i mthu yis mi 'gal tshul du tshad ma dag las rab bsgrubs te //
analyzed: goms pa'i mthu yis mi 'gal tshul du tshad ma dag las rab bsgrubs te //
translated: I have thoroughly established it through valid cognition in a way that is not contradictory through the power of habituation.

original: 'gro ba'i don du mi gnyis lam mchog 'di ni rab bgyis pas //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don du mi gnyis lam mchog 'di ni rab bgyis pas //
translated: Having thoroughly composed this supreme path of non-duality for the benefit of beings,

original: skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du yang skad cig tu //
analyzed: skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du yang skad cig tu //
translated: In all the abodes of birth, in an instant,

original: mi mthun phyogs kyis mi nyams rgyal ba kun gyi thugs 'di rab rgyas shog /'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs kyis mi nyams rgyal ba kun gyi thugs 'di rab rgyas shog /'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The composition by Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´mitra is complete.
